description.description: A flying Supporter who makes enemies weaker

baseDescription.baseDescription: Deals damage to a single target in front with her sniper rifle. Prioritizes attacking air units within range. In [Critical Breakthrough] state, basic attack's damage is increased, valid Hits change to 2 and AoE damage is dealt.

Upon deployment, deals damage to all enemies with a shockwave from her high-speed maneuver. While on the battttlefield, enemies received DMG Taken AMP +15%. Each time a unit leaves the battlefield, her Ultimate Skill cooldown is reduced by 1 second, and her Special Skill cooldown by 0.5 seconds.

level5.level5: DMG Taken AMP effect is increased by 2x while in [Critical Breakthrough] state.

baseDescription.baseDescription: Unleashes a shockwave from her high-speed maneuver that deals AoE damage and becomes immune to damage while moving. 1 damaged target in front becomes Unavoidable for 5 seconds.

level5.level5: All attacks always inflict CRIT damage while in the [Critical Breakthrough] state. Up to 3 damaged targets become Unavoidable for 5 s

baseDescription.baseDescription:
Launches an attack in front by unleashing the flight unit's performance. She becomes immune to damage while moving and enters the [Critical Breakthrough] state that cannot be canceled for 20 seconds after using her Ultimate Skill. 

[Critical Breakthrough]: Immune to all Hitstuns, ASPD +50%, Skill Seal Immunity.

level5.level5: Resets Special Skill cooldown after skill
